roleset.name: reduce greatly, make the least
roleset.note: MINIMIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'minimize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Adjectival 'minimal' added by Julia based onmedi-tmprl1to8. (from minimize.01-v)
MINIMISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'minimise' based on sentences ectb2. No verbnet entry. Comparison to minimize and maximize (from minimise.01-v)

example.name: minimize-v: typical usage
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it-1 will retain an investment banker *trace*-1 to explorealternatives ``*trace*-1 to minimize shareholder value,'' includingthe possible sale of the company.

roleset.name: small in amount
roleset.note: MINIMAL-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comparison to minimize.01. (from minimal.01-j)

roles.note: Adjective is unlikely to take an arg0 (from minimal.01-j)
